name: Lazy Santa
description:
"Lazy Santa" is a charming and festive 2D Puzzle-Platformer, created in 48 hours for the Yogscast Game Jam 2020.

Play as a budding elf who is tasked with waking up a famously lazy Santa Clause on Christmas Eve. You have to get creative if you want to wake this Santa up - he is a very heavy sleeper and keeps taking naps!

Use brains and the element of surprise to solve the puzzles and wake Lazy Santa up in 4 unique levels so he can deliver his presents on Christmas Eve.

The game works on both PC and mobile!

Controls:

Use the ARROW KEYS, or the on-screen arrow buttons if you're on mobile, to move, climb and jump.

Click / tap to interact with nearby objects.

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------

I made "Lazy Santa" in 48 hours for Yogscast Game Jam 2020 as a solo developer. All the gameplay, art and music was made by me during the 48 hour time limit. I used Construct 3 to make the game, Photoshop to make all graphics and art, and LMMS to make the music. The sound effects are taken from various royalty-free sources.

The jam theme was "Surprise". My idea is that Santa is so lazy that he can only be woken up by being "surprised". I also achieved the "Brunch Club" modifier by including some throwable food in the game.
